args.name: *type (0 = loaded from another map | 1 = loaded from main menu)
change in radial distance from target
move time  !!! terrible name! moves the camera to a preset over a certain number of frames
*out element of last attack from battle[188]
boolean use dust effect (flag 1 for script[7C])
move time (only moves in a horizontal plane)
*out key item slot (FFFF if not found)
*out item slot (FFFF if none were available)
*out item slot (FFFF if none were removed)
*dest (0 ordinary gameplay | 1 manually issuing commands in demo | 2 demo map transition?)
button code to OR with existing buttons
button code to negate and AND with existing buttons
